name: Dr. Stone Battle Craft
storyline:
Thousands of years have passed since humanity was turned to stone by a mysterious phenomenon—
The extraordinarily intelligent and scientific Senku wakes up from his petrified prison

Finding earth as a prehistoric "Stone World", he is determined to bring back the modern world with the power of science.

Starting with Taiju Oki, his energy abundant childhood friend who awoke around a similar time, he gathers comrades determined to rebuild civilization from scratch.
summary:
A war breaks out between the "Kingdom of Science" and the "Might Empire"!
Collect materials through battles, explore the world, create various items, and defeat your opponents!
